column4: i keep seeing a service called gate crasher in my firewall and when i looked online it said its a windows backdoor but im running linux
it says the source is my ip
is something running? on my pc?
i was getting this from my firewall list
do you have any windows ocmputers behind you?
yes you would see it in system monitor. Which firewall are you talking of?
bit torrent uses the same port and firestarter thinks its gate crasher
if its a windows backdoor then my linux wont be affected right
correct as others have stated I guess its possible for wine to run viruses backdoors etc.. that would just mess up you .wine folder in your home if thats even possible.
are you using bit torrent though?
I'm using Vuze a bit torrent client
well you may want to check what port its using. I bet its using the same port that the window trojan uses thats why firestarter is allerting.
Should I shut off the firewall when running torrent?
you don't have to just make acceptions for those ports.
